title: Vicky Ford – 2022 Comments on Africa and the Green Revolution
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Vicky Ford, the Minister for Africa, on 11 May 2022.
content:
I am delighted to have made my first visit to Côte d’Ivoire and to be the first UK Minister to attend a UN Convention to Combat Desertification COP event.
